description.value: At 10th level, you can create a barrier of fast winds around yourself for 1 minute. This acts as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{Wind Wall} on all sides of your square, protects you with @Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{Feather Fall}, and doesnâ€™t interfere with your ranged attacks.
